Kentwood.Grand Rapids Christian High School: Grand Rapids Christian High School (GRCHS) is a parentally-controlled, private, Christian secondary school in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Founded in 1920, "Christian High" is a member of Grand Rapids Christian Schools and Christian Schools International. The school was first accredited by the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools in 1925–26—one of the first six high schools in Kent County to receive that honor.
